item.title: WordPress - MarsEdit - schedule the future date of publishing bug
item.description: I've been using MarsEdit for years and really like its features - recently I reformatted my Mac and now find that all my WordPress posts are being published immediately.

item.title: Getting Twitter Tools to work with MarsEdit
item.description: Just wondering if this works — I'm trying to make MarsEdit work with a plugin that I love called TwitterTools
